question.title: Multiple Choice
question.text: Identify the image(s) below that represent good design. Select all that apply and click Submit below.

ContentStructure.title: By the end of this lesson you should be able to:  Define design and understand intent. Define interior design and understand its scope. Discuss career opportunities in Interior Design. Use anthropometric data for Interior Design.
One definition proposed by Richard Seymour is “making things better for people.”  Design focuses on human  behavior and quality of life.
Design involves an activity that translates an idea into reality.
Every design has the following characteristics:
Design is the response to a user’s need.
Design methods lead to innovation of products and services.
The products and services designed should work in a commercial environment and be beneficial to both producer and consumer.
A good design serves the society at large while primarily serving individual needs.
Fill in the blank with the appropriate answer and click Submit.
Design focuses on human behavior and quality of life.
You must answer the question before continuing.
Incorrect - Design focuses on human behavior and quality of life. Click Next to continue.

question.title: Knowledge Check
question.text: Fill in the blank with the appropriate answer and click Submit.

question.title: Knowledge Check - Case Study
question.text: Choose the characteristics that best suit the picture below and those pictures on the previous slide. Choose all options that apply and click Submit.

ContentStructure.title: A group of activities that change a space into an effective living area.
A person who conceptualizes, coordinates and manages the activities of interior design.
In the course of designing a space, an interior designer has to:
Formulate and convey design ideas and intent and execute the project
The American Society of Interior Designers (ASID) defines an Interior Designer as one who “is professionally trained to create a functional and quality interior environment.”
Interior Decorators are primarily concerned with decoration including paint, fabric, furnishings and accessories . . . items that change the look, aesthetics or visual impression of a space.
Architects are responsible for designing and coordinating the overall construction of the building.
Interior Designers have vast knowledge of the History of Art, Architecture, Furniture and Design. They have skills in sketching, drafting, modeling and rendering.
Interior Decorators have skills related to visual impressions of space.
Architects usually have vast knowledge of the History of Art, Architecture, Furniture and Design.

Interdisciplinary Skills  Interior Designers can handle matters related to acoustics, lighting, HVAC, plumbing, exterior elements (doors, windows, grills, railings, etc.) structural modification, 3D building, modeling and more. Click Play button to watch HVAC video.

Identify whether the statement below is True or False.  Interior Design describes a group of various, yet related projects that involve turning an interior space into an “effective setting” for a particular range of human activities.  Make your selection and cllick Submit.
Incorrect - The answer is True. Click next to Continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

Pooja and Rahul with their son, move into their newly purchased 3 bedroom single family house in Ooty, which is 30 year old. They want to update the look of this house. They do not need any strutural changes.  A wall between the kitchen and dining room has to be removed, as sink has to be moved, new flooring and paint colors are also needed. Professional help on furnishings and the design of the master bedroom is required. They are confused whether to go with Rupali, an Interior Designer or Rakesh, an Interior Decorator or Pooja’s uncle Srinivas, an Architect. Since Rahul is not good at visualizing, they will need some drawings, sketches and 3D of the design changes that will be made.
Who do you think Poojah and Rahule should choose to consult with them in updating their house?  Select the appropriate professional and click Submit.
Incorrect - Correct answer is Rupali. Click Next to continue.
You must answer the question before continuing.

ContentStructure.title: Interior designing is a career which requires creative skills in the areas of art and design.
As an interior designer you are expected to bring greater functionality to a living space and create a perfect atmosphere for the intended purpose.
Interacts with clients - extract what they want and convey your artistic and creative ideas
Interacts with professionals like building contractors, electricians and carpenters
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Click each button to view areas of specialization.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Residential structures such as houses, flats and canal boats.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Workplaces such as factories and offices.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Temporary exhibition designing such as museums, galleries and a wide range of other private and public settings.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Commercial structures such as retail shops, shopping malls, warehouses and conference centers.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Leisure areas such as cinemas, theatres and gyms.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Hospitality sector such as hotels, restaurants, pubs, cafes and night clubs.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Education structures like schools and colleges.
Areas of Specialization for an Interior Designer
Healthcare facilities such as local health centers, hospitals, nursing and care homes and private clinics.
Work Areas for an Interior Designer

Top-notch architects and architectural firms Renowned builders Hospitals and other medical facilities Town and city planning bureaus Hotels and health resorts Design studios and exhibition organizers Event management companies Work as a freelancer
Identify whether the statement below is True or False.  An interior designer should bring in greater functionality to a living space and create a perfect atmosphere for the intended purpose.
You must answer the question before continuing.
